article.headline: Disney launching âMando Mondaysâ for âMandalorianâ products as second season airs
article.body: Mando Mondays will take place for nine weeks as "The Mandalorian" airs on Disney+ Disney Walt Disney Co. and Lucasfilm have teamed up for âMando Mondays, â a weekly release of new product tied to the blockbuster Disney+ series âThe Mandalorian.â New products, games and more will be introduced each Monday starting on Oct. 26 until Dec. 21. The second season of âThe Mandalorian,â which stars the popular âbaby Yodaâ character, will begin airing on October 30 on Disney+. âThe Mandalorianâ won seven Primetime Emmy Awards last week, including one for outstanding special visual effects. Disney DIS, +1.53% is kicking off the event on Monday with pre-orders for the Hasbro HAS, +1.36% Black Series Credit Collection, Funko Inc.âs FNKO, +0.81% new bobblehead dolls and a Lego construction set. Disney stock has tumbled 12.6% for the year to date while the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% is down 4.8% for the period.
